Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_start_offset_tx

This register controls when CPRI requests TX samples from the RFIF RMAC relative to the TX RFP. This register should be programmed to request samples 4 basic frames before the time specified in CPRI()_MAP_OFFSET_TX.

For example, if CPRI()_MAP_OFFSET_TX[MAP_TX_OFFSET_Z]=0 and CPRI()_MAP_OFFSET_TX[MAP_TX_OFFSET_X]=0, then software should program [START_TX_OFFSET_Z]=149 and [START_TX_OFFSET_X]=251.
